Interface Record

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface Record

    • Method Detail

      • addValue

        void addValue(Column key,
              DataType value)
        Adds a column-value pair to the tuple.
        Parameters:
        key - The colmn to add.
        value - The value to add.

      • getData

        java.util.LinkedHashMap<Column,DataType> getData()
        Returns:
        The tuple.

      • project

        Record project(java.lang.Integer[] projectedColumns)
        Projects a set of columns from the caller record.
        Parameters:
        projectedColumns - Columns to project from the caller record.
        Returns:
        Record containing the projected columns.

      • evaluate

        boolean evaluate(BinaryExpressionTree expressionTree)
        Evaluates an expression tree against the caller record.
        Parameters:
        expressionTree - The expression tree to evaluate.
        Returns:
        The evaluation result of the expression tree against the caller record.

      • join

        Record join(Record record)
        Parameters:
        record - The record to join with the caller.
        Returns:
        The record in which the caller and the record argument are joined together.

      • equates

        boolean equates(Record record,
                Expression expression)
        Parameters:
        record - The record to equate against.
        expression - The expression in which the columns are evaluated against; column = column. For example, a = b.
        Returns:
        The result of equating the caller record with the argument record.

      • equiJoin

        Record equiJoin(Record record,
                Column column)
        Joins the caller record with the argument record iff they equate to each other. See equates.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to join with the caller record.
        column - The column to remove from the argument record. If there was a Project after an EquiJoin, SQLToAlgebra assumes that the projected columns does not contain the right column of the EquiJoin.
        Returns:

      • update

        void update(java.util.LinkedHashMap<Column,DataType> data)
        Updates the record.
        Parameters:
        data - The data to update.

      • delete

        void delete()
        Deletes the caller record.

      • isDeleted

        boolean isDeleted()
        Returns:
        The status of the caller record.
